channel.title: robert on Barefoot Rob

item.title: hey thats my name
item.description: Hey that’s my name 18 August 1998 I got home from gymnastics and had a voice message from Bridge! I haven't seen her in like 6 years, and I was surprised to hear her area code is 281. That's near me! (Last I heard she was in Virginia) But here's the weird part: I called her back and her son Robert answered. Nothing too strange about that, (except that he's 9 now instead of 3) but when I told him my name he's all "
